projectDescription: A Chrome/Firefox extension that tracks your posture in real-time using webcam and TensorFlow.js MoveNet, applying visual feedback to help maintain healthy sitting positions.
keyFeatures: Real-time posture tracking using TensorFlow.js MoveNet Lightning model
Visual blur effect feedback when posture deteriorates
Privacy-focused with no data collection or external tracking
Browser action controls for quick posture reset and tracking toggle
publicApiSurface: Options component - Main camera interface with pose detection
Popup component - Browser action popup for quick controls
Content component - Content script that applies blur effects
Background script - Message relay between options and content scripts
loadMoveNet() - Loads the MoveNet pose detection model
detect() - Performs pose detection on video frames
handlePose() - Processes detected poses and determines posture status
drawCanvas() - Renders pose keypoints and skeleton on canvas
